1.title: Select A Character!

11.title: Stuart "2D" Pot

111.content:
In what phase does this take place?

Phase One: Celebrity Take Down
Phase Two: Slowboat to Hades
Phase Three: Escape to Plastic Beach
111.title: Phase?

1113.content:
It was another lazy day on Plastic Beach. Murdoc was up in the recording studio, Cyborg-Noodle in her charging station, and 2D was left wandering the island out of boredom. Eventually, he made his way to the office, where a strange package sat on the desk.

"Eh? Wot's this?" the blue-haired male muttered to himself. Glancing around to make sure Murdoc wasn't looking, he tore the box open. Inside was a book, covered with strange runes. "Wow..." Stu muttered as he cracked it open and examined the contents. "A spell to make the speaker bigger..." he read aloud after a page caught his eye. "This spell can cause the user to grow larger every day. Simply speak the words. Looks interestin'. Wonder if it works."

2D snuck back down to his room at the bottom of the 'island' opened the book again. Lost in imaginary scenarios of a muscular version of himself throttling Murdoc for all the crap the bassist put him through, he rapidly recited the spell aloud, his thick Cockney accent mangling several words. Looking down, he expected it to do something, waiting for something to change.

After nothing happened, 2D sighed. "Shoulda' known it was a dud... better put it back 'fore Muds sees it's gone..." Stu did just that, carefully closing the box, unaware that the spell had indeed worked, just not quite as intended. The singer went to his bed, and soon drifted off to sleep, not hearing his stomach gurgle or feel his lanky 150-pound body swell with fat.

When 2D woke later that night, he weighed...
1113.title: Stu Pot and the Spell Book

11131.content:
Stu woke up hours later to a slight pain in his pants, like they had grown tighter. "Ow..." he muttered. According to a clock, it was just past midnight. Yawning and absent-mindedly scratching his stomach, he walked to the bathroom for a drink.

After finishing, he glanced at the full-body mirror on the door and did a double-take. "Wot the?" 2D muttered, stripping off his shirt, hoping he had imagined the bulge underneath. He hadn't; his pale body had grown visibly larger. Stu's face had filled out, giving him chipmunk cheeks. A potbelly was pushing against his waistband, which explained the pain from earlier. His formerly twig-like arms now had definition, though not with muscle, he noted as he gripped a meaty forearm, but with soft fat. "Wot 'appened to me?" he asked himself, turning to the side to examine his larger rear. Grabbing it and giving a squeeze, the singer recalled the spell he had clumsily recited the previous day. "It worked... not the way I wanted, but it worked!" Stu frowned and put his other hand on his belly, noting how squishy it was.

"I tink I sorta... like it..." he smiled, unbuttoning his jeans and allowing his belly to swell out another inch or two. 2D patted and rubbed the swell happily and stood on a scale. "200 pounds? I put on 'bout fifty in a few hours!" he exclaimed happily before yawning and going back to his bed, sitting down in his undies.
11131.title: 2-D Going on 3-D

choices: Went up the elevator to get breakfast
1113121.content:
2D woke up the next day to find himself wider and softer. His belly was fairly large, round and soft, occupying a good deal of the young man's lap. A pair of moobs had grown from his formerly flat chest, and his butt and thighs were straining against their confines.

Giving his new girth a pat, 2D wandered to a closet and pulled on some clothes, wisely passing over his normal skinny jeans in favor of a comfortably snug baggy pair. After pulling on a short sleeve shirt that didn't fully cover his stomach, he...
1113121.title: Swelling Singer

11131211.content:
Up n the kitchen, the azure-haired male cooked himself a large plate of bacon and fried eggs before sitting down to eat, grateful for the silence... which lasted only a moment before Murdoc showed up in search of food.

Does he notice 2D's gain?
11131211.title: Went up the elevator to get breakfast

111312112.content:
As usual, Murdoc ignored 2D completely, instead heading straight for the fridge, where he dug out an old slice of pizza and munched on it as he wandered off.

2D said nothing as he watched Murdoc head into his office, and refocused his attention on his food.
111312112.title: No

1113122.content:
2D woke up the next morning and glanced at his bare tummy with a faint smile. It was still the same size it had been last night. "Can still hardly believe that spell worked!" he muttered sleepily, dragging his feet toward the closet.

2D pulled on a t-shirt that hinted at a belly underneath, and a fairly snug pair of skinny jeans. Giving the cloth-covered lump a pat, he smiled as it gurgled hungrily. He headed over to the elevator, flinching as the whale drifted past the window and darting in.

It dinged a brief moment later, and the singer headed off to the kitchen to cook himself a greasy breakfast.
1113122.title: Waking up

11132.content:
2D woke up hours later to a loud popping noise, followed by a clatter. "What was that?" he muttered, sitting up with more than the usual amount of effort. He looked around and saw a button lying on the floor. Before he made to retrieve it though, his eyes were drawn to the large mass in front of him.

His once-slender stomach had grown considerably, much to his shock. 2D rushed into the bathroom and shut the door, examining himself in the mirror behind it. His face had swollen considerably from its angular boniness to a soft puffiness. He had begun to grow a second chin along with it. 2D's arms had filled out their sleeves almost to bursting. After shucking off his rather tight shirt, he found that a pair of moobs had sprouted from his chest and were splayed over his ginormous belly, which was the focal point of his body and hung over his waistband. Lifting up the soft flab, he found the origin point of the button: his fly had exploded open from the quickness of the gain, sending the button away.

Turning to the side and dropping his stomach, 2D noticed a pair of lovehandles had developed and hung out from his sides. His ass looked incredibly cramped inside his pants, as did his thighs. "I... I look like a beach ball!" he said in...
11132.title: 2D times two

111321.content:
2D patted his belly, giggling slightly as it jiggled. "I think I like this!" he commented with a smile. "I wanted to be bigger... I guess I must've gotten what I wanted!"

The singer yawned. It was pretty late, but he was also hungry.
111321.title: Liking it.

1113212.content:
2D's belly gurgled. "Maybe a quick snack before bed..." he muttered, patting his girth before changing his jeans for sweats and walking into the elevator.

Padding into the kitchen, the softening singer made a large sandwich, nearly half a foot long and covered with various meats. "So good..." he muttered, before plopping down in a chair and eating, not knowing that the spell would cause him to gain...
1113212.title: He went to get food

11132121.content:
With each mouthful, another pound made its way onto the singer's porky frame. Slowly, his shirt rode up, and after twenty bites, showed his belly button and a sliver of flesh above it, the finished sandwich digesting within.

2D stretched his flabby arms over his head, pulling his shirt up even more almost to his chest, and scratched his large stomach. "Ah, that feels better..." he moaned happily as he stood up, the chair emitting a squeak. "Eep!" the blue-hair waddle-walked to the elevator as footsteps made themselves known.
11132121.title: 1 pound per bite

111321212.content:
Fortunately, 2D made it to his room undetected. "That was close..." he muttered as he got back into bed and looked at his gut. "Wonder how Muds'll react when he sees this tomorrow..." the singer rubbed his swollen stomach gently, feeling the small sea of fat flow beneath his fingers. "Guess I'll find out tomorrow!" 2D yawned and drifted off to sleep.

-----

The next morning, the singer got up and dressed in a large pair of pants, sandals, and a "Hello Kinky" long sleeve shirt that failed to cover his expansive belly. Taking a moment to examine himself in the mirror, he smiled and ran a hand over his large ass. "Lookin' good!" Stu complimented his reflection with a smile before stepping on the scale. "270!?" he exclaimed. "Wow... I'm getting real big, but I'm not complaining!"

With that, 2D waddled into the elevator to get breakfast. On the way to the kitchen, he ran into Murdoc. "Oh! Uh, G'morning Murdoc..." he chuckled nervously.
111321212.title: He makes it to bed.

1113212121.content:
"Where'd that come from?" the band leader snapped, poking roughly at the singer's girth.

"I- I dunno! I just woke up after reading one of your books and I was huge!" 2D admitted. "It actually felt kinda good!"

"You WHAT?" Murdoc snarled. 2D gulped in reply. "You read one of the getting bigger spells, huh?" The singer nodded, scared. "Well, since you wanna be big, how 'bout I help you with that?" Murdoc smirked.
1113212121.title: Muds offers "help"

choices: The seat of his pants split open (300 pounds)
11132121211.content:
The bassist retrieved the spell book from his office and returned to the dining room, where a nervous 2D hadn't moved from where he stood. and flipped to a page. "Ah, this'll work..." Reciting a verse, Murdoc poked at 2D's belly, which gurgled loudly in response. "That just increased your appetite by a helluva lot..." he chuckled, then cast another spell that conjured a box of donuts. "Enjoy..." Smirking, Murdoc strolled off, simply standing out of sight near the door and watching.

2D drooled at the smell of the box's contents and plopped his titanic rear in a chair, which groaned in protest. Almost unconsciously, he grabbed the box and opened it, revealing a dozen of cream-filled, chocolate covered pastries. The singer rubbed at his roaring stomach. "So hungry..." Immediately he began shoveling donuts into his mouth, barely noticing that the box wasn't running out. Every time one was removed, another materialized in its place. The singer's body soon began to swell rounder and rounder.

His belly pushed out further from under his shirt, causing it to ride up and reveal his belly button. Stu's snug pants began to tighten as 2D's butt and legs swelled. Pale love handles slowly advanced over his waistband, which began to creak under the pressure. His sandals strained under the effort of holding his growing feet. His already taut sleeves could barely hold back the swelling arm fat as is cheeks grew rounder and his chin became two. The blue-haired male kept eating until...
11132121211.title: More Magic

choices: Later, Murdoc casts a spell that would double 2D's gaining speed
111321212111.content:
The blue-haired male kept eating until the seat of his pants split wide open.

"Eep!" The loud rip startled 2D out of his feeding frenzy. Murdoc re-entered the room, laughing.

"You enjoy that, faceache?" he asked, before casting the counter spell to the Appetite spell. "'Cause you just split your trousers!"

2D blushed bright red and reached behind himself. Feeling the edge of the rip, he leaned back, causing the fly of his jeans to burst open. If possible, his face tuned even redder. "Oh..." 2D moaned in pleasure as his girth flowed outward, freed from his constricting waistband. The singer brought his hands forward to rub at his girth as the blush faded into a pleased smile. "Actually, Muds..." he said, "I did enjoy that!"

Murdoc was stunned by 2D's response, and watched in silence as the blue-haired fatty stood up from his chair, picked up another pastry and bit into it with a hand on his butt. After eating it, he picked up the box and waddle-walked off to his room.

Setting the box down on his bed, 2D went to check his weight: 300 pounds! He grinned. "Wonder how long it'll be till I reach 400?" he commented brightly, hugging his belly.
111321212111.title: 300 and loving it!

1113212121111.content:
Back upstairs, Murdoc was mildly annoyed that 2D was enjoying his size. He growled and flipped through the book, finding a spell that caught his eye. "He wants to be big?" Murdoc smirked. "Let's see how he likes being borderline immobile!" He said the spell aloud and used 2D's full name where it said to insert the targets's name. A brief flash of magic emitted from the tome in Murdoc's hand. The spell was intended to increase how fast the swiftly swelling singer would gain.

2D sat on his bed, which was a mass of hollowed-out plastic containing a mattress that emitted several creaks when he sat down or shifted his rear, tapping out a melody on his keyboard. Focused on his music, Stu almost didn't notice the energy hitting himself. "Hmm?" he looked around the empty room. "Guess it was nothing." he muttered, shrugging.

2D stretched his arms, loving how the fat weighed them down, before resting them on his plush paunch. "Can't believe Muds wants me to hate this or whatever..." he muttered, playing with his fat. "'cause this feels great! I'm so warm and soft..." 2D hugged himself, squishing his arms into his belly, which gurgled loudly and hungrily in response. He chuckled. "Okay, okay..." 2D said fondly as he reached for the never-ending donut box and pulled it closer, snatching a pastry as he did so.

The spell Murdoc had cast doubled the amount 2D would grow from eating. He managed to eat...
1113212121111.title: Doubling the gain

11132121211112.content:
As 2D ate, his body swelled larger and larger. He could feel the legs of his pants growing tighter, painfully so. Slowly the seams snapped apart one by one, revealing pale tree-trunk thighs. His belly inched outward, covering more and more of his lap. His long sleeves began to go the same way as his jeans, tearing apart starting at the wrists then moving upward. The front of his shirt slid upward toward his growing pecs and exposed his increasingly cavernous belly button. 2D kicked off his too-tight sandals as a second chin inflated beneath his jaw.

The singer's goal of 400 came and went, and 2D continued to grow. His clothes grew more and more tattered, stitches popping along his sides. Love handles drooped over 2D's waistband, which was beginning to cut into his sides. However the singer was too hungry to do more than grunt in pain and shift off the edge of his bed. He slid to the floor with a thump, and the waistband of his trousers burst open, revealing a butt that was squeezed into a red pair of too-tight undies. His hunger finally began to slow to a halt and 2D set the box aside.

"Oh man..." he moaned, slowly clambering to his feet. "I'm stuffed..." 2D huffed and puffed as he pulled all 500 pounds of his body upright. The singer wobbled slightly as his girth readjusted to the new position while the torn remains of his pants slipped to the floor. Carefully stepping out of them, 2D experienced the sensation of his fat thighs rubbing against each-other. "Well, that's something new..." he admitted, waddling his way to the bathroom, still panting slightly from exertion.

2D squeezed his way into the now-cramped lavatory, his hips brushing the doorframe. Standing on the scale revealed that he had nearly grown too big to see the glowing red digits. "Whoa..." the singer commented, slightly shocked. "I gotta weigh a quarter-ton. Certainly feels like it!" He patted his belly, which jiggled and rippled in response. "Hehe! Though I might need some new clothes..." the male added, feeling the cool air on his thighs.

2D took the elevator up, pulling his belly close to him, with the intention to find either Murdoc or the spellbook and get them to give him bigger clothes.
11132121211112.title: Quarter-Ton Two-Dee

choices: Noodle-bot with orders to stuff him
111321212111121.content:
Carefully, he waddled out of the lift into Murdoc's room. 2D could hear the Satanist muttering to himself inside. Slowly, the blue-head approached the door and knocked.

'WHAT?" The green-skinned bassist snarled, then smirked as he saw the massive blue-haired male. "Heh, lemme guess-you want some new clothes?"

"Y-yes please?" 2-D tried to shrink down.

"Mmm... tell ya what. I'll give you some, but only after you reach 750 pounds."

"750?!" 2-D was stunned. "But that's almost half a ton!"

"Exactly." Murdoc crossed his arms. "Take it or leave it."

"... fine." The singer hung his head, absently scratching his belly. Slowly he turned his blubber around, only to receive a painful snap from the rear, courtesy of Murdoc pulling on his undies. "Eep!"

Murdoc just laughed. "Looks like your almost as big as that whale out there!" he chortled.

2D didn't know whether to be scared or irritated. Instead he just hurriedly waddled to the lift and squeezed in, riding it up to the kitchen.

Once he arrived, he found something waiting for him.
111321212111121.title: Murdoc's deal

1113212121111211.content: Sitting on the table was a massive spread of food. 2D suddenly felt like he was starving and began to eat.
1113212121111211.title: A large feast

choices: "Murdoc! What have you done to him!?", blaming Murdoc for fattening up 2D.
11132121211112111.content:
The Japanese guitarist Noodle walked in. She looked around smelling food. The female guitarist is as hungry as 2D. Suddenly, she noticed that 2D grew so big and soft.

2D looked embarrassed and said "Ummm...Hi Noodle--"

Noodle reacted...
11132121211112111.title: Noodle walks in

choices: Murdoc came back with a surprise...
111321212111121111.content:
"Oh my god! Oh my god! Oh my god!" Noodle shouted as she ran, jump, and landed on 2D's soft and enormous belly.

"Noodle--!?", 2D felt startled as the female guitarist began to snuggle the singer's flabby stomach.

"Ooooh...your tummy is so soft....I can't help it. I think you will be a great sumo wrestler". Then she started to tickle him, from his lower chest area, then down near his navel.

2D giggled "Hehehehehe...that tickles! feeling the ticklish sensation.

Murdoc interuppted "Your feast is getting cold."

"Okay Murdoc...whatever." 2D and Noodle replied.

"I was afraid that you're not goin't to like my new flabby look, but I'm glad you're luvin' it. You can rub my tums, massage it, and sleep on it...all you want. Boy I'm starving". The blue haired singer began to much down all the delicious food as his belly rumbled.

"Arigato~! I'm starving too butterscotch angel." Noodle quickly stuffs her face while giggling to the stomach gurgling and churning sounds.

"While you lovebirds enjoy, I'll be right back! I'll get something super special..." The green-skin bassist walks out of the room while 2D and Noodle are near finished with their meals.

After they're finished. The female guitarist had a strange yet warm hearted feeling. She's feeling full and sleepy, wanting to rub 2D's belly "Kanari nemui...Can I have a nap?"

"Oh sure! What makes you happy, makes me happy." 2D waddled over to find a pillow. He laid his head on the pillow, allowing the tired, full, and happy Japanese girl to climb on and sleep on top of the singer's ginormous belly.

"Mmmmmmm...." Noodle naps while hugging and rubbing her "butterscotch angel"'s tums like she's on a puffy cloud. 2D used his abdominal muscles to moves his fat and full belly, sloshing up and down like an ocean wave.

He smiled and whispered "Awwww...it feels so good...that's the best belly rub I'm having...".
111321212111121111.title: Squealing, "Kawaii desu~!!!", wanting t...

choices: 2D tries to ignore it, not wanting to gain any more.
2D goes to get a large snack.
111322.content: The singer was terrified as he poked the jiggling mass. "No! I didn't want this!" he cried out. "When I wanted to be bigger I wanted muscle, not this!" 2D tugged at the flesh, watching as it shook in the mirror when his belly gurgled.
111322.title: Horror

choices: See if the book has a reversal spell
eat-he felt like he was starving!
1113221.content: 2D resisted the urge to eat. "No! I don't wanna eat!" He stomach disagreed however. Sighing, the blue hair trudged to the elevator in order to...
1113221.title: Up we go!

11132212.content:
The blue haired singer made his way to the kitchen, luckily no one was home in the morning, due to Russel was taking Noodle out for the day. 2D looking in the fridge and found lots of good stuff, which he carried down to his bedroom. "I really don't want to do this..." He sighed and looked down at his huge gut. "My public figure will be ruined if anyone sees me this big..."

He pouted but his huge belly grumbled. "I know I know... Your hungry!" He angrily bit into some food. "Well... Maybe this isn't so bad...being big..." He sighed and continued to eat, his pale pudgy belly growing bigger and bigger with every bite. Finally being finished with everything in the fridge, 2D let out a big burp. "Ugh... That was intense... But it felt a little good..."

He tried to stand up, but found it much harder then last time. Upon standing, his pant's buttons bursting. "O-oh..." He rubbed his swollen belly that was at least twice the size it was before he started to snack. He went into the kitchen, taking up a lot of his energy just to get there, to put back his plates. He was hoping no one would walk in.

But then he heard the front door click...
11132212.title: eat-he felt like he was starving!

choices: Come on to 2D and hopefully get to touch his nearly perfect body
111322121.content:
As he set the plate next to the sink, 2D heard a door creak behind him. He turned around and gasped anxiously when he saw Noodle walking into the kitchen. He immediately jumped in the pantry to hide. He heard aalking and then saw a light. Noodle had opened the door and was now staring at the half naked 2D standing fearfully behind it.

Noodle: 2D-
2D: I can explain, I found dis book, and it said it could make me biggeh, but I thought it ment muscle and-
Noodle: you're blocking the cereal.
2D:oh-

2D got out of the way and Noodle grabbed the box of Shredded* wheat thins. 2D was perplexed by the situation. He had always thought that bing over-weight was a bad thng, and since it had been drilled into his head that he was "the pretty poster boy" for Gorillaz, he could not expect anyone to accept his new appearence. Yet here Noodle was, not even flinching at his sudden weight gain, pouring herself a bowl of cereal like she did every morning. This comforted him while the thought of Murdoc beating him into bulimia waved around in his head as the next course of action in this unfortunate situation.
Noodle, like 2D, was struggling to keep her cool. As soon as she'd seen 2D, she felt her face turn red despite the fact that her expression hadn't even changed. She struggled to not stare at his fat gut as she poured the milk into her creal. Finally, she gave in and looked at him, milk pouring onto the counter for a split second.

Noodle: You gained some weight.
2D: Dat's wot I was saying, I found dis spell book and it made me gain weight, but in fat, when I wanted muscle and-
Noodle: you look good.
2D: wot!?

Noodle had now started to blush. She obviously thought 2D looked better chubby, but she didn't know what to do. She decided to
111322121.title: It's Noodle!

1121.content:
"Ughhh.." 2D groaned as he fell onto his bed. He had just been cheated on by his dream girl. Paula Cracker. He whimpered and squeezed onto his pillow. Its been like 2 weeks but he still hadn't gotten over it. He had tried everything. Meditating, forgetting about her, dating other girls, and even drinking. Nothing stopped the constant pain. He was out of ideas. He turned over onto his back and looked down at his bare chest. So fucking thin. Why? Its not like he had to be. Ya know food was an option for after bad break ups. He knew that. He had called Paula and asked why she did it she said she wanted someone with more to handle her. Well if he was bigger there would be more of him. Yeah! It already lightened his mood. He wouldn't want to do it alone... And he's definitely not gonna ask someone from the band. Talk about Awk-ward. Time to go to the next source. The internet. He found a site and found a specific profile. It had a phone number and he dialed it quickly.
"Hello?" Answered a sweet sounding girl voice.
"Oh, uhmm Hi." 2D replied in an awkward tone
"Your looking to get fattened up huh?"
"Uhh yea. I mean... Well.. Yes."
"Great I'll come over tonight could I get an address?"
"Uhh Kong Studios. We're the house on top of the cliff."
"Ok see you then big boy!"
*Click*
He looked at his phone and then dropped it next to him. He sighed and fell back on the bed. He looked at his chest and imagined it fatter. He got an awkward boner which he glared at. Before he knew it it was 8:00 and the door to his room was getting knocked on.
"Coming one second!" He said pulling on a Hello Kinky T-Shirt. He swung open the door to reveal a thin, busty, and beautiful girl with big blue eyes and blonde curly hair. She had a blue tank top and grey shorts which were a bit to short.
"Can I come in?" She asked in the same tone she had on the phone.
"Oh. Uh yea!"
She stepped in the room and looked around,
"So um. How is this gonna work?" 2D asked scratching his neck.
"Well I have loads of food in the Semi Truck outside, you just go ahead and make your self comfortable I'm gonna bring in the first course. She said with a wink.
"O-o-okay." He said his voice breaking. He went over to his bed and laid down. In a minute or two he saw her coming back in with 2 big boxes.
"Here we are!" She said setting them on his chest. He licked his lips and tore open one of the boxes. It had 2 dozens of Chocolate cupcakes. He grabbed one in each hand and horfed them down.
"Might I ask the starting weight?" The girl asked sitting on the edge of the bed.
"190" He said through loud bites of cupcakes.
"Ok and your goal is?"
"Until you run out of food." She looked at him and raised an eyebrow.
"I know what I'm doing trust me." She chuckled and looked back to the clip board.
"Ok... So do you want to include... sexual activities?" She asked looking back over to him.
"M-m-maybe..." He said winking.
"I'll take that as a yes." She said looking back to the clipboard.
2D gobbled down the rest of the cupcakes and went to the next box. He ripped it open to reveal a huge tub of rocky-road ice-cream. He grinned and grabbed the spoon connected to the box. He swallowed bite after bite. He could feel his belt and t-shirt slowly getting tight. He grinned. The whole situation was turning him on. The woman hovered above him.
"Could ya go any faster?" She said looking bored. 2D looked at her questionably.
"Uhhmm... *Smack* I Think *Slurp* So."
He put the spoon to the side and stuck his face in the ice-cream forcibly eating large amounts. He was about halfway through and he could feel his shirt ridding up to reveal a pale doughy flesh beneath it. She felt warm hands pushing up against his stomach lightly and then they began rubbing around in circles. He pulled his face out to watch her for a second but she grabbed his head from the back and pushed it back down into the ice-cream. She straddled him and began massaging as his T-shirt went up higher and higher and the doughy stomache slowy spread out on his lap.
1121.title: Ooh :)

choices: The following day, with the rest of the group
The following night with the girl
11211.content:
As 2D was finishing the ice cream, he felt something grind on his lap. That's when he noticed his erection. He looked ahead and saw the girl, naked massaging his belly as she grinded heavily over his genital area. She leaned forward and he dropped the carton in awe, melted ice cream dribbling down his chin. The girl leaned over and licked the ice cream before kissing him passionately. 2D began taking off his shirt, but found it difficult due to his sore stomach. The girl pulled down his pants, and as soon as 2D had his shirt off, they jumped at eachother in sexual frenzy. They hen had passionate sex that ended in both of them lying down, breathing heavily and drooling in sexual ecstasy.
2D: so, you're into this kind of stuff?
The girl: (laughing) How could you tell?
2D doesn't catch on.
2D: well, you kept squeezing my belly and stuff somI assumed and-
The girl laughs and gets up
The girl: same time tomorrow?
2D: sure. See you then.

choices: Made anything he ate convert almost instantly into fat
Made him gain weight at a steady rate the longer he put off his end of the deal
1243.content:
Deep in the bowels of hell, a demon growled. A perfectly ordinary demon noise, but this wasn't an ordinary demon. It was Beelzebub, demon of the Deadly Sin of Gluttony. His big black wings furled tightly.

"Murdoc is late..." he muttered. "Since he has failed to fulfill his terms, I'll send him a little reminder to never miss my deadline." Beelzebub chuckled as he sent the singer a curse that...
1243.title: Gluttony's Irritation

12433.content:
He put a curse on Murdoc that made him gain weight at a steady pace until he repaid the demon. "This... This should do it..." He laughed evilly.

Murdoc was sleeping as the magic rushed him, making his belly swell slowly. Of course the sleepy satanist didn't wake up. He just rolled onto his side, snoring loudly and scratching his bum. His stomach was now a little pudgy, somewhat soft. It would probably make it hard to get any pants on (if he planned on wearing pants).

Soon the famous Murdoc woke up, but had a little struggling trying to sit up. "Oi... What the hell?" He looked down and couldn't see his "mini Murdoc" since a big greenish pile of fat hid it. "Is this a beer belly? Maybe I should lay off the beer..." He sighed.

Slowly he sat up and rubbed his new gut. He reached over to his side table and grabbed a shirt. He slipped it over his head and tried to pull is over his gut. It hid it, but you could see a little distress coming from the middle. Murdoc then went to try on some pants. He groaned as he stuffed his pudge into the pants. "I can't be fat... I'm not ruining my image... Girls don't want fat guys..." He huffed and tried to suck it all in as he pulled the buttons together on his pants. "There..."

Murdoc went to head downstairs for breakfast, hoping no one would notice...

How shall the giant drummer gain weight?

Over-eating: Self-explanatory

info.brief_description: Time to fatten up Murdoc, 2D, and Russel!
info.description:
Based on one of prisonsuit-rabbitman's fabulous pictures Extra 2D (http://fav.me/d4utest), it's time to fatten up the Gorillaz! (I do not own the Gorillaz, yadda yadda yadda... standard disclaimer)

Choose a character, method, and Phase of Gorillaz, and you're good to go!

1. Decent grammar and spelling are required. I'm not talking English major, just... it won't be a story if you can't read it!
2. Any form of weight gain is permitted! Science, magic, or even classic over-eating. Heck, even a combo is allowed after you progress far enough!
3. The Blue whale is the heaviest animal on earth, weighing in at 300,000 pounds (150 tons). This is the weight limit. Do not exceed it! Chapters that do will be removed!
4. Any "suddenly [character] weighed 10000 pounds!" like chapters will be removed. This is not debatable and is bad story-telling.
5. There is not a length limit to a chapter-so long as it is at least one sentence, I will be happy!
6: Foul language is allowed.
7. And this one's important: Have fun!
